mapper.insert: insert into `pixterest`.`comments` (pin_id, user_email, comment_id, content, created_at, is_deleted) values (#{comment.pinId}, #{comment.userEmail}, #{comment.commentId}, #{comment.content}, #{comment.createdAt}, #{comment.isDeleted})
mapper.select: select c.`id` as `id`, c.`pin_id` as `pinId`, c.`user_email` as `userEmail`, c.`comment_id` as `commentId`, c.`content` as `content`, c.`created_at` as `createdAt`, c.`is_deleted` as `isDeleted`, u.`nickname` as `nickname` from `pixterest`.`comments` c join `pixterest`.`users` u on c.user_email = u.email where c.`pin_id` = #{pinId} order by c.`created_at` asc
